name: Sacred Mountain
description: A towering peak serves as a connection between earth and heaven, providing spiritual elevation and divine inspiration for those who climb its heights. The elevated position provides excellent views and defensive advantages, while the spiritual significance attracts both worshippers and those seeking to harness its divine power.
atmosphere: Wind howls through jagged peaks with voices of ancient spirits. Thin mountain air carries crisp snow and distant thunder scent. Eagles circle overhead with piercing cries that echo across valleys. Fingers trace weathered prayer flags fluttering in high winds. Skin burns with cold and thin air that makes every breath precious. Weight of altitude and spiritual significance makes heart race with both exhaustion and awe.
